content.prompt: Which of the following most accurately describes the relationship between the article referred to in paragraph 8, sentence 4 (“I searched . . . Edna Lewis“) and the author’s thesis in the passage?

choices.label: The information contained in the article contributed to the formulation of the author’s thesis.
The existence of the article demonstrates that the author’s thesis does not apply to everyone.
The process that the author used to discover the article suggests that her thesis may need to be modified.
The evidence presented in the article helped the author limit the scope of her thesis.

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Explain ways claims are qualified through modifiers, counterarguments, and alternative perspectives.
